hero_text: Gushushanya ahantu hatagira igihe, guhuza abantu, inzego, n'amarangamutima binyuze mu rurimi rwububiko.
contact_hours: Amasaha yo mu biro: Ku wa mbere kugeza kuwa gatanu, 9:00 am - 5:00 PM
projects_subtitle: Shakisha ibikorwa byacu bya vuba no kugenzura
project2_title: Kugenzura ubuziranenge: icyerekezo cyumwuga kuva yc lee umwubatsi ğŸ¢
about_subtitle: Serivisi zacu z'ingenzi ziri muri Perak, Gukunda, Kedah, Jo hafi, na Kuala Lumpur, kandi natwe dukora kandi imishinga y'amahanga.
philosophy_text: Ubwubatsi burenze imiterere numwanya - ni ibiganiro hagati yabantu nibidukikije. Dufite intego yo gushushanya imyanya iringaniza ubworoherane, elegance, no kutagira umwanya.
mission_text: Twiyemeje gukora ibishushanyo mbonera bivanga imikorere na heesthetics. Biturutse kubikoresho bigamije, buri kintu kirambuye ibibazo - cyemeza ko buri mushinga uvuga inkuru yihariye.
team_text: Ikipe yacu igizwe na bavoka ishyaka hamwe nubwubatsi buturuka ku bande batandukanye, dukorera hamwe gutanga ibisubizo by'umwuga, guhanga, no kurangiza kuri buri mushinga.
